mapper.select: select id, coupon_id, member_id, member_nick_name, get_type, create_time, use_type, use_time, order_id, order_sn from sms_coupon_history where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sms_coupon_history(coupon_id, member_id, member_nick_name, get_type, create_time, use_type, use_time, order_id, order_sn) values (#{couponId}, #{memberId}, #{memberNickName}, #{getType}, #{createTime}, #{useType}, #{useTime}, #{orderId}, #{orderSn})

insert into sms_coupon_history(coupon_id, member_id, member_nick_name, get_type, create_time, use_type, use_time, order_id, order_sn) values
(#{entity.couponId}, #{entity.memberId}, #{entity.memberNickName}, #{entity.getType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.useType}, #{entity.useTime}, #{entity.orderId}, #{entity.orderSn})

insert into sms_coupon_history(coupon_id, member_id, member_nick_name, get_type, create_time, use_type, use_time, order_id, order_sn) values
(#{entity.couponId}, #{entity.memberId}, #{entity.memberNickName}, #{entity.getType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.useType}, #{entity.useTime}, #{entity.orderId}, #{entity.orderSn})
on duplicate key update coupon_id = values(coupon_id), member_id = values(member_id), member_nick_name = values(member_nick_name), get_type = values(get_type), create_time = values(create_time), use_type = values(use_type), use_time = values(use_time), order_id = values(order_id), order_sn = values(order_sn)
mapper.update:
update sms_coupon_history
coupon_id = #{couponId},
member_id = #{memberId},
member_nick_name = #{memberNickName},
get_type = #{getType},
create_time = #{createTime},
use_type = #{useType},
use_time = #{useTime},
order_id = #{orderId},
order_sn = #{orderSn},
where id = #{id}
